text: Interesting  traditional Korean marketplace easily accessible by metro. This place has lots of delicious snacks and street food and you can see stalls selling hugh and tiny reddish, hugh cabbage and big red apples, etc.  Worth a visit ðŸ˜Š
The market is a local community asset that the residents support in order to sustain it.   It was good to visit such a market rather than only see a market aimed at tourists.
